import sys

def main():
    A, B = map(float, sys.stdin.readline().split())
    print(int(A * B))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
#!/usr/bin/env python3

import sys

def main():
    A, B = map(float, sys.stdin.readline().split())
    print(int(A * B))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()


n = int(input())
a = [int(i) for i in input().split()]

print(sum(a) - n)


a, b = map(int, input().split())
print(a * b)

import sys

def main():
    A, B = map(float, sys.stdin.readline().split())
    print(int(A * B))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()


a = int(input())
b = int(input())
print(a * b)
